Text: Star Manager: \n Take the side road back.
Kitten, long time \n no see!
How would you like \n to be Hekseville's \n number-one star?
You mean number-one \n stunt woman?
That's another way to \n put it! You're so \n perfect for the job.
Poterie Doll just \n loved your work.
Sh-She did? THE Poterie \n Doll liked my work?
And if she likes you \n again, you could costar \n in her next feature.
She's on a drama \n location shoot downtown \n as we speak.

Her eager fans are a 
 little too eager and 
 need some guiding... 
 away from the shoot.
You want me to \n draw them off?
Exactly! Here's a radio, \n I'll be in touch.
Of course, you'll need \n to look the part.
Star Manager: \n Head up the stairs.
Star Manager: \n Keep going straight.
Star Manager: \n Turn left.
Star Manager: \n Almost there.
Fan: \n I heard Poterie has a location shoot around here.
Fan: \n I've totally got to get her signature!
Attract 100 Fans
Fans Attracted
I've still got their attention, better lead them away.
Guide the Fans
No, not this way.
I need to pull those fans away from the square.
Star Manager: \n Poterie went that way.
Great job, Kitten!
Poterie had nothing but \n good things to say about \n her lovely bodyguard.
Bodyguard!?

Don't get hung up on 
 words, I can tell this 
 is leading to great 
 things, Kitten.

Remember to stay 
 in shape - never know 
 when you'll be 
 needed again!
Uh...
I'm quitting show \n business.
What!? \n You can't be serious!?

It's just... 
 Everything's so 
 different from what I 
 pictured in my head.

I'm not cut out for this 
 life. I'm going back to 
 being a plain old 
 Gravity Shifter.
It-It's her!
Stay back, you \n shouldn't be-
Out of the way, Pops!
It's her, it's really \n her!
I'm not Poterie, I'm \n just a fake.
We know! We know! \n We're Gravity Queen \n fans!
Fans of me!? \n Really?

Can I shake your hand? 
 Thank you for everything 
 you've done for us 
 and the city!
You're so cool! Can I \n have your autograph?
S-Sure, one handshake \n and signature coming up.
Thank you sooo much! \n Keep up the great work!
We're behind \n you all the way!
Thank you for the \n support!
Well, my dreams of being \n a star are over...

But I guess it's just as 
 well because I was only 
 made for one role: 
 Gravity Queen.
